document_data.name: Shields of Yartar
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shields of Yartar''' was a group of mounted soldiers that defended the city of [[Yartar]].
document_data.Organization: The [[Waterbaron]] of Yartar served as the Shields' highest-ranking commander. They were served by a number of officers known as Overswords.
document_data.Activities: In defense of the city, the Shield was often forced to drive off monstrous raiders, such as bands of [[orc]]s and groups of [[troll]]s.
document_data.Base of Operations: The group was headquartered in the [[Shield Tower]] located just west of the city proper, across the fortified bridge that spanned the [[River Surbrin]].
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, the ranks of the Shields had been infiltrated by agents of the [[Kraken Society]].
